attributes.action: GIVE MEMBERS OF THE ARMED FORCES COUNCIL TAX RELIEF WHILST OUT OF AREA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why is it that when Members of Her Majesty's Armed Forces go to War they still have to pay Council Tax?? Surely this is totally unacceptable especially when criminals locked up for their crimes don't have to pay Council Tax for the duration of their prison sentence!!!

rejection.details: Please re-draft without all the CAPITALS as they make it hard for people to read
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
